title: Mordecai Honored
summary: The king cannot sleep and reads the records, discovering Mordecai’s earlier act of loyalty. He asks Haman how to honor a man the king delights in. Thinking it's for himself, Haman suggests grand honors—but then must bestow them on Mordecai.

faq.question: What causes the king to honor Mordecai?
faq.answer: He reads the royal records and realizes Mordecai had not been rewarded for saving his life.

faq.question: How does Haman react?
faq.answer: He is humiliated, having to publicly honor the man he planned to kill.
